definition[0]: if someone has had it, they are going to fail or die, or be in serious trouble
example[0]: Press the wrong button and you’ve had it.
definition[1]: if someone has had it, they are very tired or annoyed and cannot continue with something
example[1]: I can’t believe he’s done it again. I’ve had it with him!
definition[2]: if something has had it, it no longer works and cannot be repaired
